title: A FontBook for sale
content:
Sorry if this is completely inappropriate, but I’m needing to sell an extra FontBook I have. I bought a copy and then won a copy in the same week (imagine that). It’s brand new, unopened, and on eBay ( [http://tinyurl.com/38ufye](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906205520/http:/tinyurl.com/38ufye "http://tinyurl.com/38ufye")).

 [‹ Post Graduate TypeDesign Education](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906205520/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42371 "Go to previous forum topic") [Old Mac system fonts? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906205520/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42449 "Go to next forum topic")
author: dressedinvalue
